We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private DonchianChannel _dch;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_dch = DCH(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_dch.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "DCH Upper Band", _dch.UpperBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "DCH Lower Band", _dch.LowerBand);
    Plot("My Indicators", "DCH Current", _dch.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.dch = self.DCH(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.dch.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DCH Upper Band", self.dch.UpperBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DCH Lower Band", self.dch.LowerBand);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "DCH Current", self.dch.Current);
